      • addVideoReference

        int addVideoReference(int videoId,
                      int commentId,
                      VideoReference videoRef,
                      int userId)
               throws ClassicDatabaseException,
                      ClassicNotFoundException,
                      ClassicUnauthorizedException
        add a video reference
        Parameters:
        videoId - id of the video the comment refers to
        commentId - the id of the comment
        videoRef - reference to add
        Returns:
        id of reference
        Throws:
        ClassicDatabaseException
        ClassicNotFoundException
        ClassicUnauthorizedException

                                                      int commentId)
                                               throws ClassicDatabaseException,
                                                      ClassicNotFoundException
        get all video references that refer to the given video
        Parameters:
        commentId - id of the comment
        videoId - the id of the video
        Returns:
        all the references that belong to this video in this comment
        Throws:
        ClassicDatabaseException
        ClassicNotFoundException
